pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Instrumental Variable Methods in Linear Models // Inference for the treatment effect with possibly invalid instrumental variables via TSHT('Guo et al.' (2016) arXiv:1603.05224) and SearchingSampling('Guo' (2021) arXiv:2104.06911), which are effective for both low- and high- dimensional covariates and instrumental variables; test of endogeneity in high dimensions ('Guo et al.' (2016) arXiv:1609.06713).
